releaseNotes:
Major Update v1.1.8:

1. Biometric Overhaul: Added support for Face Unlock and dynamic UI labels (Face/Fingerprint/Iris).
2. Sync Improvements: Fixed duplicate reference creation and improved Manual Folder protection.
3. Storage Logic: Implemented 'Two-Port Save' to distinguish between App Library and Device Storage files.
4. UI Enhancements: Fixed persistent update indicator (Red Dot) and Save button visibility.
5. Weak Biometric Support: Enabled support for broader range of biometric sensors.
